content.question: The debates about maritime shipping in Japan alluded to in the first paragraph were most directly connected to which of the following nineteenth-century developments?

choices.label: The development of Marxist critiques of international capitalism
The development of trade union and labor movements dedicated to advancing industrial workersâ€™ rights
The development of rival economic theories differing with respect to their views of free trade
The development of opposing political factions supporting or resisting Westernization reforms within many Asian governments

content.answer: The development of rival economic theories differing with respect to their views of free trade

topic.text: 5.7: Economic Developments and Innovations in the Industrial Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
